anya-e0103n2:1_1: Appā icchā etassāti appiccho, paccayagedharahito. Tassa bhāvo appicchatā, alobhajjhāsayatāti attho. Samaṁ tuṭṭhi, santena, sakena vā tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi, santuṭṭhi eva santuṭṭhitā,
anya-e0103n2:1_2: aññaṁ apatthetvā yathāladdhehi itarītarehi paccayehi paritussanā.
anya-e0103n2:1_5: Te guṇeti te sīlavodānassa hetubhūte appicchatādiguṇe. Sampādetunti sampanne kātuṁ.
anya-e0103n2:1_6: Te hi sīlavisuddhiyā paṭiladdhamattā hutvā dhutadhammehi sampannatarā honti.
anya-e0103n2:1_7: Dhutaṅgasamādānanti kilesānaṁ dhunanakaaṅgānaṁ viddhaṁsanakāraṇānaṁ sammadeva ādānaṁ. Evanti evaṁ sante,
anya-e0103n2:1_9: Sallekho kilesānaṁ sammadeva likhanā chedanā tanukaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:1_11: Apacayo yathā paṭipajjanato kilesā naṁ apacinanti na ācinanti, tathā paṭipajjanā.
anya-e0103n2:1_15: Sīlañceva yathāsamādinnaṁ paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ dūrībhāvena suparisuddhaṁ bhavissati.
anya-e0103n2:1_16: Vatāni ca dhutadhammā ca sampajjissanti sampannā bhavissanti, nipphajjissanti vā.
anya-e0103n2:1_17: Yā thirabhūtā itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanasantuṭṭhi porāṇānaṁ buddhādīnaṁ ariyānaṁ paveṇibhāvena ṭhitā,
anya-e0103n2:1_19: Bhāvanā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti bhāvanārāmo, tabbhāvo bhāvanārāmatā,
anya-e0103n2:2_2: Nibbānādhigamassa anulomato anulomapaṭipadā vipassanābhāvanā. Atthatoti vacanatthato. Pabhedatoti vibhāgato. Bhedatoti vināsato.
anya-e0103n2:3_3: ‘‘Nadiyā kūla’’ntiādīsu viya samussayattho kūla-saddoti āha ‘‘paṁsukūlamiva paṁsukūla’’nti.
anya-e0103n2:3_4: Ku-saddo kucchāyaṁ ula-saddo gatiatthoti āha ‘‘kucchitabhāvaṁ gacchatīti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti,
anya-e0103n2:3_5: paṁsu viya kucchitaṁ ulati pavattatīti vā paṁsukūlaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:3_6: Paṁsukūlassa dhāraṇaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ uttarapadalopena, taṁ sīlamassāti paṁsukūliko, yathā ‘‘āpūpiko’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:3_7: Aṅgati attano phalaṁ paṭicca hetubhāvaṁ gacchatīti aṅgaṁ, kāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:3_9: so samādānacetanāsaṅkhāto dhammo paṁsukūlikassa aṅganti paṁsukūlikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:4_0: Eteneva nayenāti yathā paṁsukūladhāraṇaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ, taṁsīlo paṁsukūliko,
anya-e0103n2:4_2: evaṁ eteneva vacanatthanayena ticīvaradhāraṇaṁ ticīvaraṁ, taṁsīlo tecīvariko,
anya-e0103n2:4_5: na kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikādīsūti tāni sarūpato dassento ‘‘saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhāta’’nti āha.
anya-e0103n2:5_0: Taṁ piṇḍapātanti parehi diyyamānānaṁ piṇḍānaṁ patte patanasaṅkhātaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ, taṁ uñchatīti piṇḍapātiko, yathā bādariko sāmākiko. Piṇḍapāti eva piṇḍapātiko, yathā bhaddo eva bhaddako.
anya-e0103n2:5_6: tañca dassetuṁ ‘‘avakhaṇḍanarahitaṁ anugharanti vuttaṁ hotī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:5_8: Patte piṇḍoti ettha vatthubhedo idhādhippeto, na sāmaññaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:5_9: Eva-kāro ca luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento ‘‘kevalaṁ ekasmiṁyeva patte’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n2:5_10: Uttarapadalopaṁ katvā ayaṁ niddesoti dassento ‘‘pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṁ katvā’’ti āha. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
anya-e0103n2:6_0: Pacchābhattaṁ nāma pavāraṇato pacchā laddhabhattaṁ eva.
anya-e0103n2:6_1: Khalu-saddassa paṭisedhatthavācakattā tena samānatthaṁ na-kāraṁ gahetvā āha ‘‘na pacchābhattiko’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:6_2: Sikkhāpadassa visayo sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhitto. Yo tassa avisayo,
anya-e0103n2:6_3: so eva samādānassa visayoti āha ‘‘samādānavasena paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassā’’ti. Abbhokāse nivāso abbhokāso. Susāne nivāso susānaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:6_4: taṁ sīlaṁ assātiādinā sabbaṁ vattabbanti āha ‘‘eseva nayo’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:6_6: Taṁ hesa ‘‘idaṁ bahumaṅkuṇaṁ duggandhapavāta’’ntiādivasena appaṭikkhipitvāva sampaṭicchati.
anya-e0103n2:6_8: Tena tena samādānenāti tena tena paṁsukūlikaṅgādikassa samādānena dhutakilesattāti viddhaṁsitakilesattā,
anya-e0103n2:6_9: tadaṅgavasena pahīnataṇhupādānādipāpadhammattāti attho. Yehi taṁ kilesadhunanaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:6_10: tāniyeva idha dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgānīti adhippetāni, na aññāni yāni kānici,
anya-e0103n2:6_11: aññena vā dhutassāti ayamattho atthato āpanno.
anya-e0103n2:6_12: ‘‘Ñāṇaṁ aṅgaṁ etesa’’nti iminā ñāṇapubbakataṁ tesaṁ samādānassa vibhāveti.
anya-e0103n2:9_0: Samādānacetanāya gahaṇaṁ taṁmūlakattā pariharaṇacetanāpi dhutaṅgameva. Attanā,
anya-e0103n2:9_1: parammukhena ca kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṁ viluppanaṭṭhena loluppaṁ taṇhācāro,
anya-e0103n2:10_0: Bhagavatova santike samādātabbānīti idaṁ antarā avicchedanatthaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:10_1: rañño santike paṭiññātārahassa atthassa tadupajīvino ekaṁsato avisaṁvādanaṁ viya.
anya-e0103n2:10_4: Aṭṭhakathācariyassāti yassa aṭṭhakathātantiyeva visesato paguṇā, tassa.
anya-e0103n2:10_6: Jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthūti so kira thero nesajjiko , tassa taṁ na koci jānāti.
anya-e0103n2:10_7: Athekadivasaṁ rattiyā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṁ vijjulatobhāsena disvā itaro pucchi ‘‘kiṁ, bhante, tumhe nesajjikā’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:10_8: Thero dhutaṅgappicchatāya tāvadeva nipajjitvā pacchā samādiyīti evamāgataṁ vatthu.
anya-e0103n2:12_0: 24.Gahapatidānacīvaranti ettha dāyakabhāvena samaṇāpi ukkaṭṭhassa gahapatipakkhaṁyeva paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:12_2: na pana gahapatidānacīvaranti tādisaṁ nivattetuṁ dānaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:12_3: Aññatarenāti ettha samādānavacanena tāva samādinnaṁ hotu,
anya-e0103n2:12_5: Yathā ‘‘devadatto divā na bhuñjatī’’ti vutte ‘‘rattiyaṁ bhuñjatī’’ti atthato āpannameva hoti,
anya-e0103n2:12_7: evamidhāpi bhikkhuno gahapatidānacīvare paṭikkhitte tadaññacīvarappaṭiggaho atthato āpanno eva hoti,
anya-e0103n2:13_0: Evaṁ samādinnadhutaṅgenātiādividhānaṁ paṁsukūlikaṅge paṭipajjanavidhi. Susāne laddhaṁ sosānikaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:13_1: Taṁ pana yasmā tattha kenaci chaḍḍitattā patitaṁ hoti,
anya-e0103n2:13_2: tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘susāne patitaka’’nti. Evaṁ pāpaṇikampi daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:13_3: Tālaveḷimaggo nāma mahāgāme ekā vīthi. Anurādhapureti ca vadanti.
anya-e0103n2:13_8: Vātāhatampi sāmikānaṁ satisammosena patitasadisanti ‘‘sāmike apassantena gahetuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_1: coḷakabhikkhāvasena laddhañca laddhakālato paṭṭhāya ‘‘samaṇacīvaraṁ siyā nu kho,
anya-e0103n2:14_2: no’’ti āsaṅkaṁ nivattetuṁ ‘‘na taṁ paṁsukūla’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_3: Na hi taṁ tevīsatiyā uppattiṭṭhānesu katthaci pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_4: Idāni imināva pasaṅgena yaṁ bhikkhudattiye lakkhaṇapattaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:14_6: Tattha gāhetvā vā dīyatīti saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā dentehi yaṁ cīvaraṁ vassaggena pāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ dīyati.
anya-e0103n2:14_7: Senāsanacīvaranti senāsanaṁ kāretvā ‘‘etasmiṁ senāsane vasantā paribhuñjantū’’ti dinnacīvaraṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_8: Na taṁ paṁsukūlanti apaṁsukūlabhāvo pubbe vuttakāraṇato, gāhetvā dinnattā ca.
anya-e0103n2:14_10: Tatrapīti yaṁ gāhetvā na dinnaṁ bhikkhudattiyaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:14_11: tatrapi yena bhikkhunā cīvaraṁ dīyati, tassa lābhe,
anya-e0103n2:14_12: dāne ca visuṁ visuṁ ubhayattha ādaragāravānaṁ sabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n2:14_13: tadabhāvato ca bhikkhudattiyassa ekatosuddhi ubhatosuddhi anukkaṭṭhatā hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘yaṁ dāyakehī’’tiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:14_15: Yassa kassacīti ukkaṭṭhādīsu yassa kassaci. Ruciyāti chandena. Khantiyāti nijjhānakkhantiyā.
anya-e0103n2:15_0: Nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvoti upasampannasamanantaraṁ ācariyena vuttesu catūsu nissayesu attanā yathāpaṭiññātadutiyanissayānurūpāya paṭipattiyā vijjamānatā.
anya-e0103n2:15_5: Dhutadhamme samādāya vattanaṁ yāvadeva upari sammāpaṭipattisampādanāyāti vuttaṁ ‘‘sammāpaṭipattiyā anubrūhana’’nti. Mārasenavighātāyāti mārassa,
anya-e0103n2:15_8: Dhāritaṁ yaṁ lokagarunā paṁsukūlaṁ, taṁ ko na dhāraye,
anya-e0103n2:15_10: tasmā ko taṁ na dhārayeti yojanā yaṁtaṁsaddānaṁ ekantasambandhibhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:15_11: Paṭiññaṁ samanussaranti upasampadamāḷe ‘‘āma bhante’’ti ācariyapamukhassa saṅghassa sammukhā dinnaṁ paṭiññaṁ samanussaranto.
anya-e0103n2:18_2: Aññataravacanenāti ettha yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Yāva na sakkoti, yāva na labhati,
anya-e0103n2:18_3: yāva na sampajjatīti paccekaṁ yāva-saddo sambandhitabbo. Na sampajjatīti na sijjhati.
anya-e0103n2:18_8: parassa vā santakaṁ senāsane paccattharaṇavasena adhiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:18_10: aṁsakāsāvanti imāni dvepi atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitānipi dhutaṅgabhedaṁ na karontī’’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0103n2:18_11: Pariharituṁ pana na vaṭṭatīti rajanakāle eva anuññātattā niccaparibhogavasena na vaṭṭati tecīvarikassa.
anya-e0103n2:18_13: Kāyaparihārikenāti vātātapādiparissayato kāyassa pariharaṇamattena. Samādāyevāti gahetvā eva.
anya-e0103n2:18_16: parikkhāracoḷavasena ca bahūsu cīvaresu anuññātesupi ticīvaramatte ṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n2:21_13: Vihāre pakkabhattampīti upāsakā idheva bhattaṁ pacitvā ‘‘sabbesaṁ ayyānaṁ dassāmā’’ti vihāreyeva bhattaṁ sampādenti, taṁ piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n2:21_15: Taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvāti ‘‘mā, bhante, piṇḍāya carittha,
anya-e0103n2:21_16: vihāreyeva bhikkhā ānīyatī’’ti vadantānaṁ sampaṭicchanena taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvā.
anya-e0103n2:21_18: Ariyavaṁsoti ariyavaṁsasuttapaṭisaṁyuttā (dī. ni. 3.309; a. ni. 4.28) dhammakathā.
anya-e0103n2:22_3: Niccaṁ antaragharaṁ pavisantasseva suppaṭicchannagamanādayo sekhiyadhammā sampajjantīti sekhiyapaṭipattipūraṇaṁ. Paṭiggahaṇe mattaññutāya,
anya-e0103n2:22_6: Antimāya jīvikāya avaṭṭhānena mānappahānaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘antamidaṁ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:23_2: Attabharassāti appānavajjasulabharūpehi paccayehi attano bharaṇato attabharassa.
anya-e0103n2:23_3: Tato eva ekavihāritāya saddhivihārikādīnampi aññesaṁ aposanato anaññaposino.
anya-e0103n2:23_4: Padadvayenāpi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato sallahukavuttitaṁ, subharataṁ, paramaappicchataṁ, santuṭṭhiñca dasseti.
anya-e0103n2:23_5: Devāpi pihayanti tādinoti tādisassa bhusaṁ ativiya santakāyavacīmanokammatāya upasantassa paramena satinepakkena samannāgamato sabbakālaṁ satimato piṇḍapātikassa bhikkhussa sakkādayo devāpi pihayanti patthenti.
anya-e0103n2:23_6: Tassa sīlādiguṇesu bahumānaṁ uppādentā ādaraṁ janenti, pageva manussā.
anya-e0103n2:26_2: Puratoti vīthiyaṁ gacchantassa purato gharaṁ apaviṭṭhasseva.
anya-e0103n2:26_3: Pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pesakāravīthiyaṁ pesakārabhāvaṁ nimminitvā ṭhitassa sakkassa gharadvāre pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:26_4: Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko taṁ divasaṁ na bhikkhaṁ āgamayamāno nisīdati, tasmā taṁ anulometi.
anya-e0103n2:26_5: Katthacipi kule nibaddhaṁ upasaṅkamanābhāvato paricayābhāvena kulesu niccanavakatā.
anya-e0103n2:26_6: Sabbattha alaggamānasatāya ca sommabhāvena ca candūpamatā.
anya-e0103n2:29_1: ekanisajjāya eva abhuñjitvā visuṁ visuṁ nisajjāsu āhāraparibhoganti attho.
anya-e0103n2:29_3: Vattaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatīti vattaṁ kātuṁ yujjati.
anya-e0103n2:29_5: Tattha pana paṭipajjanavidhiṁ dassetuṁ yaṁ theravādaṁ āha ‘‘āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṁ vā’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n2:29_6: Tassattho – ekāsanikaṁ bhikkhuṁ bhuñjantaṁ āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya,
anya-e0103n2:29_7: dhutaṅgabhedato yāva bhojanapariyosānā na vuṭṭhātabbanti vuttaṁ hoti .
anya-e0103n2:29_9: abhuñjiyamānaṁ yāva bhuñjituṁ nārabhati, tāva vuṭṭhātabbanti attho.
anya-e0103n2:29_11: tasmā vattakaraṇaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ na rakkhatīti adhippāyo. Tenāha ‘‘ayañcā’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n2:29_12: ‘‘Bhesajjatthamevā’’ti iminā bhesajjaparibhogavaseneva sappiādīnipi vaṭṭantīti dasseti. Appābādhatāti arogatā.
anya-e0103n2:29_14: Lahuṭṭhānanti kāyassa lahuparivattitā. Balanti sarīrabalaṁ. Phāsuvihāroti sukhavihāro.
anya-e0103n2:29_15: Sabbametaṁ bahukkhattuṁ bhuñjanapaccayā uppajjanavikārapaṭikkhepapadaṁ. Rujāti rogā.
anya-e0103n2:29_18: bahuso bhojane abyāvaṭabhāvato, arogabhāvato cāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:32_0: 29.Appaṭikūlaṁkatvā bhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati paṭikūlassa bhuttassa agaṇhanampi siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:32_1: Pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabbanti ‘‘ekabhājanameva gaṇhāmī’’ti bahuṁ gahetvā na chaḍḍetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:32_3: Atra atra nānābhājane ṭhite nānārase icchā etassāti atriccho, tassa bhāvo atricchatā, tassā atricchatāya pahānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:32_4: Āhāre payojanamattadassitāti asambhinnanānārase gedhaṁ akatvā āhāre satthārā anuññātapayojanamattadassitā.
anya-e0103n2:32_5: Visuṁ visuṁ bhājanesu ṭhitāni byañjanāni gaṇhato tattha tattha sābhogatāya siyā vikkhittabhojitā,
anya-e0103n2:35_1: tassa paṭikkhepena taṁ atirittaṁ bhojananti atirittabhojanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:35_2: Puna bhojanaṁ kappiyaṁ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:35_5: Yasmiṁ bhojaneti yasmiṁ bhuñjiyamāne bhojane. Tadeva bhuñjati, na aññaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:35_6: Anatirittabhojanapaccayā āpatti anatirittabhojanāpatti, tato dūrībhāvo anāpajjanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:35_10: Puna pariyesanavasena pariyesanāya khedaṁ na yāti.
anya-e0103n2:38_1: araññañca sarūpato dassetuṁ ‘‘tattha saddhiṁ upacārenā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_3: Yo koci satthopi gāmo nāmāti sambandho. Indakhīlāti ummārā. Tassāti leḍḍupātassa.
anya-e0103n2:38_5: Tattha hi ‘‘gāmā vā araññā vā’’ti anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggahe tadubhayaṁ asaṅkarato dassetuṁ ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañcā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_7: Nippariyāyato pana gāmavinimuttaṁ ṭhānaṁ araññameva hotīti abhidhamme (vibha.
anya-e0103n2:38_12: Na hi so vinayapariyāyike ‘‘araññe vasanato āraññiko pantasenāsano’’ti sutte vutto.
anya-e0103n2:38_13: Ayañca suttasaṁvaṇṇanāti idha sabbattha suttantakathāva pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_14: Tasmā tattha āgatameva lakkhaṇaṁ gahetabbanti dassento ‘‘taṁ āropitena ācariyadhanunā’’tiādinā minanavidhiṁ āha.
anya-e0103n2:39_0: Tato tato magganti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṁ pidahati.
anya-e0103n2:39_2: Yathāparicchinne kāleti ukkaṭṭhassa tayopi utū, majjhimassa dve, mudukassa eko utu.
anya-e0103n2:39_4: Nipajjitvā gamissāmāti cittassa sithilabhāvena dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjatīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:39_6: yathāladdhova kāyaviveko sātthako kātabbo’’ti manasikārasabbhāvato ‘‘bhabbo…pe… rakkhitu’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:39_7: Assa āraññikassa cittaṁ na vikkhipanti āpāthamanupagamanato.
anya-e0103n2:39_9: Jīvitanikantiṁ jahati bahuparissaye araññe nivāseneva maraṇabhayassa dūrīkaraṇato.
anya-e0103n2:39_10: Pavivekasukharasaṁ assādeti anubhavati janasaṁsaggābhāvato. Ārādhayantoti anunayanto.
anya-e0103n2:39_11: Yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipattiyā vivekassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato āraññikaṅgayogino vāhanasadisanti katvā vuttaṁ ‘‘avasesadhutāyudho’’ti,
anya-e0103n2:42_2: Tattha hi tesaṁ rājūnaṁ balakāyo upagantvā antarantarā yuddhaṁ kareyya,
anya-e0103n2:42_3: corāpi pāripanthikā samosarantā bhikkhussa sukhena nisīdituṁ na denti.
anya-e0103n2:42_4: Cetiyarukkho ‘‘devatādhiṭṭhito’’ti manussehi sammatarukkho pūjetuṁ upagatehi manussehi avivitto hoti. Niyyāsarukkho sajjarukkhādi.
anya-e0103n2:43_1: tarūnaṁ vā paṇṇesu vikārassa khaṇabhaṅgassa dassanena.
anya-e0103n2:43_3: Tāpi hi rukkhaṭṭhavimānesu vasantiyo rukkhesu vasanti. Ayampi rukkheti sahavāsitā.
anya-e0103n2:43_6: 128) evaṁ nissayoti ca bhāsito. Abhirattāni taruṇakāle, nīlāni majjhimakāle, paṇḍūni jiṇṇakāle. Patitāni milāyanavasena.
anya-e0103n2:43_7: Evaṁ passanto tarupaṇṇāni paccakkhato eva niccasaññaṁ panūdati pajahati, aniccasaññā evassa saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0103n2:46_1: ‘‘Rukkhamūlaṁ paṭikkhipāmī’’ti ettake vutte channaṁ appaṭikkhittameva hotīti ‘‘channañcarukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipāmī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:46_2: Dhutaṅgassa sabbaso paṭiyogipaṭikkhepena hi samādānaṁ ijjhati, no aññathāti.
anya-e0103n2:46_3: ‘‘Dhammassavanāyā’’ti imināva dhammaṁ kathentenāpi uposathadivasādīsu suṇantānaṁ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṁ tehi yācitena channaṁ pavisituṁ vaṭṭati,
anya-e0103n2:46_4: dhammaṁ pana kathetvā abbhokāsova gantabbo. Rukkhamūlikassāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n2:46_8: Maggamajjhe ṭhitaṁ sālanti sīhaḷadīpe viya maggā anokkamma ujukameva pavisitabbasālaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:47_2: Acchannamariyādanti yathā vassodakaṁ anto na pavisati,
anya-e0103n2:47_4: Anto pana pabbhārassa vassodakaṁ pavisati ce,
anya-e0103n2:48_0: Paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati yathāvuttapabbhārādike ṭhapetvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:48_1: Jānitvāti dhammassavanādiatthaṁ channaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pavisitvā nisinno ‘‘idāni aruṇo uṭṭhahatī’’ti jānitvā.
anya-e0103n2:48_2: Rukkhamūlepi katthaci attheva nivāsaphāsukatāti siyā tattha āsaṅgapubbako āvāsapalibodho,
anya-e0103n2:48_3: na pana abbhokāseti idheva āvāsapalibodhupacchedo ānisaṁso vutto.
anya-e0103n2:48_7: tasmā tattha gantuṁ neva sakkāti edisassa parivitakkassa abhāvato cātuddiso.
anya-e0103n2:48_8: Migabhūtenāti pariggahābhāvena migassa viya bhūtena. Sitoti nissito. Vindatīti labhati.
anya-e0103n2:51_2: Na tatthāti ‘‘susāna’’nti vavatthapitamatte ṭhāne na vasitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:51_3: Na hi nāmamattena susānalakkhaṇaṁ sijjhati. Tenāha ‘‘na hī’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n2:51_4: Jhāpitakālato pana paṭṭhāya…pe… susānameva chavena sayitamattāya susānalakkhaṇappattito.
anya-e0103n2:52_0: Sosānikena nāma appakiccena sallahukavuttinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṁ ‘‘tasmiṁ pana vasantenā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Garukanti dupparihāraṁ.
anya-e0103n2:52_2: Tattha uppannaparissayavighātatthāyāti ‘‘susānaṁ nāma manussarāhasseyyaka’’nti corā katakammāpi akatakammāpi osaranti,
anya-e0103n2:52_3: tattha coresu bhaṇḍasāmike disvā bhikkhusamīpe bhaṇḍaṁ chaḍḍetvā palātesu manussā bhikkhuṁ ‘‘coro’’ti gahetvā potheyyuṁ,
anya-e0103n2:52_4: tasmā vihāre saṅghattheraṁ vā gocaragāme raññā niyuttaṁ rājayuttakaṁ vā attano sosānikabhāvaṁ jānāpetvā yathā tādiso, añño vā parissayo na hoti, tathā appamattena vasitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:52_5: Caṅkamantassa yadā āḷahanaṁ abhimukhaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0103n2:52_6: tadāpi saṁvegajananatthaṁ tattha diṭṭhi vissajjetabbāti dassetuṁ ‘‘addhakkhikena āḷahanaṁ olokentenā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_1: Ārammaṇanti tasmiṁ susāne ‘‘ayaṁ vammiko, ayaṁ rukkho,
anya-e0103n2:53_4: Kenaci leḍḍupāsāṇādinā āsanne vicarantīti na paharitabbā. Tilapiṭṭhaṁ vuccati palalaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_8: pisācānubandhattā ca kulagehassa abbhantaraṁ na pavisitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_10: Matañātakānaṁ tattha gantvā devasikaṁ rodanaṁ dhuvarodanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:54_0: Susāne niccakālaṁ sivathikadassanena maraṇassatipaṭilābho. Tato eva appamādavihāritā.
anya-e0103n2:54_1: Tattha chaḍḍitassa matakaḷevarassa dassanena asubhanimittādhigamo. Tato eva kāmarāgavinodanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:54_4: jarājiṇṇānañca matānaṁ tattha dassanena ārogyayobbanajīvitamadappahānaṁ. Khuddakassa,
anya-e0103n2:54_6: Saṁviggassa yoniso padahanaṁ sambhavatīti amanussānaṁ garubhāvanīyatā. Niddāgatampīti suttampi, supinantepīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:57_2: idaṁ na sundara’’nti paritulayitvā pucchanā, olokanā ca senāsanaloluppaṁ. Tuṭṭhabbanti tussitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:57_3: Vihārassa pariyantabhāvena dūreti vā bahūnaṁ sannipātaṭṭhānādīnaṁ accāsanneti vā pucchituṁ na labhati,
anya-e0103n2:57_6: Sacassa taṁ na ruccatīti assa yathāsanthatikassa taṁ yathāgāhitaṁ senāsanaṁ aphāsukabhāvena sace na ruccati,
anya-e0103n2:57_7: mudukassa asati roge yathāgāhitaṁ pahāya aññassa senāsanassa gahaṇaṁ loluppaṁ, majjhimassa gantvā olokanā, ukkaṭṭhassa pucchanā.
anya-e0103n2:58_0: Upaṭṭhāpanīyānampi anuṭṭhāpanena sabrahmacārīnaṁ hitesitā. Tāya karuṇāvihārānuguṇatā.
anya-e0103n2:61_3: ‘‘Nesajjiko’’ti ca sayanaṁ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya eva viharituṁ sīlamassāti imassa atthassa idha adhippetattā seyyā evettha paṭiyoginī, na itare tathā aniṭṭhattā, asambhavato ca.
anya-e0103n2:61_4: Kosajjapakkhiyo hi iriyāpatho idha paṭiyogibhāvena icchito, na itare.
anya-e0103n2:61_5: Na ca sakkā ṭhānagamanehi vinā nisajjāya eva yāpetuṁ tathā pavattetunti seyyāvettha paṭiyoginī. Tenāha ‘‘tena panā’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n2:62_1: piṭṭhiapassayo cāti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi pañcaṅgo. Catūhi aṭṭanīhi,
anya-e0103n2:62_3: Ubhosu passesu piṭṭhipasse ca yathāsukhaṁ apassāya viharato nesajjikassa ‘‘anesajjikato ko viseso’’ti gāhaṁ nivāretuṁ abhayatthero nidassito ‘‘thero anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyī’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:63_0: Upacchedīyati etenāti upacchedananti vinibandhupacchedassa sādhakatamabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n2:63_4: Tato eva sammāpaṭipattiyā anubrūhanatā. Paṇidhāyāti ṭhapetvā. Tanunti uparimakāyaṁ. Vikampetīti cāleti,
anya-e0103n2:66_5: Akusalampi dhutaṅganti akusalacittenāpi dhutaṅgasevanā atthīti adhippāyo. Taṁ na yuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:66_6: yena akusalacittena pabbajitassa āraññikattaṁ, taṁ dhutaṅgaṁ nāma na hoti. Kasmā? Lakkhaṇābhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:66_7: Yaṁ hidaṁ kilesānaṁ dhunanato dhutassa puggalassa, ñāṇassa, cetanāya vā aṅgattaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:66_10: āraññikaṅgādīni pana na hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘na maya’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha imānīti dhutaṅgāni.
anya-e0103n2:66_12: Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n2:66_15: etena paṭhamenāpi atthavikappena ‘‘natthi akusalaṁ dhutaṅga’’nti dasseti.
anya-e0103n2:66_16: Na ca akusalaṁ kiñci dhunātīti akusalaṁ kiñci pāpaṁ na ca dhunāti eva appaṭipakkhato.
anya-e0103n2:66_17: Yesaṁ samādānānaṁ taṁ akusalaṁ ñāṇaṁ viya aṅganti katvā tāni dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṁ.
anya-e0103n2:66_18: Iminā dutiyenāpi atthavikappena ‘‘natthi akusalaṁ dhutaṅga’’nti dasseti.
anya-e0103n2:67_1: Te hi dhutaṅgaṁ nāma paññattīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n2:67_2: Tathā sati tassa paramatthato avijjamānattā kilesānaṁ dhunanaṭṭhopi na siyā,
anya-e0103n2:67_3: samādātabbatā cāti tesaṁ vacanaṁ pāḷiyā virujjhatīti dassetuṁ ‘‘kusalattikavinimutta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:67_4: Tasmāti yasmā paññattipakkhe ete dosā dunnivārā,
anya-e0103n2:67_5: tasmā taṁ tesaṁ vacanaṁ na gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:67_9: siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā,
anya-e0103n2:67_11: siyā asaṁkiliṭṭhasaṁkilesikāti evaṁ sesatikadukapadehipi nesaṁ yathārahaṁ saṅgaho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n2:68_1: idha pana dhutaṅgasevanāmukhena kilese vidhunitvā ṭhito khīṇāsavo ‘‘dhutakileso puggalo’’ti adhippeto.
anya-e0103n2:68_2: Tathā sabbopi ariyamaggo nippariyāyena kilesadhunano dhammo, visesato aggamaggo.
anya-e0103n2:68_5: Evaṁ dhutaṁ dassetvā dhutavāde dassetabbe yasmā dhutavādabhedena dhuto viya dhutabhedena dhutavādopi duvidho, tasmā tesaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:68_6: tadubhayapaṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkamettha sambhavatīti taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘atthi dhuto’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:69_1: Dhutadhammā nāmāti dhutaṅgasevanāya paṭipakkhabhūtānaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ dhunanavasena pavattiyā ‘‘dhuto’’ti laddhanāmāya dhutaṅgacetanāya upakārakā dhammāti katvā dhutadhammā nāma.
anya-e0103n2:69_2: Asampattasampattesu paccayesu alubbhanākārena pavattanato appicchatā santuṭṭhitā ca atthato alobho.
anya-e0103n2:69_3: Paccayagedhādihetukānaṁ lolatādīnaṁ saṁkilesānaṁ sammadeva likhanato chedanato gaṇasaṅgaṇikādibhedato saṁsaggato cittassa vivecanato sallekhatā pavivekatā ca alobho amohoti imesu dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti tadantogadhā tappariyāpannā honti,
anya-e0103n2:69_6: yena ñāṇena pabbajitena nāma paṁsukūlikaṅgādīsu patiṭṭhitena bhavitabbanti yathānusiṭṭhaṁ dhutaguṇe samādiyati ceva pariharati ca, taṁ ñāṇaṁ idamatthitā.
anya-e0103n2:69_8: Paṭikkhepavatthūsūti gahapaticīvarādīsu tehi tehi dhutaṅgehi paṭikkhipitabbavatthūsu. Lobhanti taṇhaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:70_0: Sukhumakaraṇasannissayo rāgo dukkhāya paṭipattiyā patiṭṭhaṁ na labhatīti āha ‘‘dukkhāpaṭipadañca nissāya rāgo vūpasammatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:70_2: satisampajaññe moho apatiṭṭhova appamādasambhavatoti vuttaṁ ‘‘sallekhaṁ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyatī’’ti. Etthāti etesu dhutaṅgesu. Tatthāti araññarukkhamūlesu.
anya-e0103n2:71_10: Ekameva hi dhutaṅgaṁ yathā kilesadhunanaṭṭhena, evaṁ cetanāsabhāvattā. Tenāha ‘‘samādānacetanā’’ti.
anya-e0103n2:72_0: Terasāpi dhutaṅgāni samādāya pariharantānaṁ puggalānaṁ vasena ‘‘dvācattālīsa hontī’’ti vatvā bhikkhūnaṁ terasannampi pariharaṇassa ekajjhaṁyeva sambhavaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sace hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:72_4: 1.32) vacanato channe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpitamatte dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati, na abbhokāse,
anya-e0103n2:72_9: Pavāritāya hi bhikkhuniyā atirittaṁ katvā bhuñjituṁ na labbhati.
anya-e0103n2:72_10: Kappiye ca vatthusmiṁ lolatāpahānāya dhutaṅgasamādānaṁ, na akappiye,
anya-e0103n2:72_12: Aṭṭheva honti bhikkhuniyā saṁkaccikacīvarādīhi saddhiṁ pañcapi ticīvarasaṅkhameva gacchantīti katvā.
anya-e0103n2:72_13: Yathāvuttesūti bhikkhūnaṁ vuttesu terasasu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṁ dvādasa sāmaṇerānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:72_14: Sattāti bhikkhunīnaṁ vuttesu aṭṭhasu ekaṁ pahāya satta ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:72_15: ‘‘Ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅga’’nti hi imaṁ anuvattamānameva katvā ‘‘satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīna’’nti vuttaṁ.
